oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Replication Data for: Bumble bees (Hymenoptera: Apidae) respond to moth (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae) pheromone components, leading to bee bycatch in monitoring traps targeting moth pests
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Grocock, Nicholas
Batallas, Ronald
McNamara, Emily
Sturm, Ashton
Manson, Jessamyn
Evenden, Maya
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Data associated with a study investigating the capture of wild bees in moth pheromone-baited traps in agricultural settings in Alberta, Canada. Files contain raw data on records for all captured bee specimens as well as electroantennogram (EAG) responses.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Agricultural Sciences
Bombus
Pollinator
Bycatch
Non-target
Pheromone
Semiochemical
